name: ResourceAccess
description: Specifies an OAuth 2.0 permission scope or an app role that an application requires. The **resourceAccess** property of the [RequiredResourceAccess] type is a collection of **ResourceAccess**.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique identifier for one of the [OAuth2Permission] or [AppRole] instances that the resource application exposes.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Specifies whether the **id** property references an [OAuth2Permission] or an [AppRole]. Possible values are "scope" or "role".
